scripts.build:wasm: wa compile -D SENI_BUILD_WASM -o app/dist/seni-wasm.wasm app/c/main_wasm.c -i app/c/seni_lib.c -i app/c/seni_lang.c -i app/c/seni_parser.c -i app/c/seni_unparser.c -i app/c/seni_vm_compiler.c -i app/c/seni_vm_interpreter.c -i app/c/seni_bind.c -i app/c/seni_colour.c -i app/c/seni_parametric.c -i app/c/seni_mathutil.c -i app/c/seni_matrix.c -i app/c/seni_prng.c -i app/c/seni_render_packet.c -i app/c/seni_shapes.c -i app/c/seni_uv_mapper.c -i app/c/seni_repeat.c -i app/c/seni_path.c -i app/c/seni_focal.c -i app/c/seni_ga.c -i app/c/seni_strtof.c -i app/c/seni_printf.c -i app/c/seni_timing.c -i app/c/seni_text_buffer.c -i app/c/seni_multistring_buffer.c -I app/c
